Fun Commands::
animal     - Displays an animal gif/photo from reddit
	.s animal

meme   - Pulls a meme from reddit:
	.s meme [subreddit] [new/hot/controversial]

insult   - Insults a tagged user:
	.s insult (@user)

compliment   - Compliments a tagged user:
	.s compliment (@user)

hack  - `Hacks` a tagged user or word:
	.s hack (anything)

kill      - Kinda obvious isn't it?
	.s kill (@user)

8ball     - Ask a question for it to be answered!
	.s 8ball (question)
Game Commands::
rps    - Plays rock-paper-scissors with the bot:
	.s rps

fight    - **DISABLED** Starts a 'fight' with a tagged person:
	.s fight (@user)
Utility Commands:
covid      - Displays covid-19 statistics for either the world or individual countries
	.s covid (country)

memcount   - Lists the amount of members & bots in the server
	.s memcount

temp   - Converts a given fahrenheit or celsius amount to the other unit:
	.s temp (number) (f or c)

weather   - Prints current temperature and weather description of inputed city:
	.s weather (city)
Miscellaneous Commands::
help   - Displays a help guide for Sentinel:
	.s help [-f]

yoink     - Retrieves the most recent deleted message and sends it
	.s yoink

purge   - Deletes x amount of messages in the text-channel (requires `Manage Message` permission):
	.s purge (number)

reload   - Attempts to reload either all cogs or a certain cog (requires `Admin` permissions):
	.s reload (cog)

botinfo   - Displays some information about Sentinel:
	.s botinfo

changelog - Displays changes made to Sentinel:
	.s changelog
Mod Commands::
slowmode   - Enables slowmode for the channel. Use 0 for seconds to disable slowmode
	.s slowmode (seconds)

lock   - Disables send_messages permissions for all non-admin users in the channel
	.s lock

unlock   - Enables send_messages permissions for all non-admin users in the channel
	.s unlock

warn   - Warns a user (requires `Kick Members` permissions):
	.s warn (@user) [reason]`

mute   - Mutes a user (requires `Kick Members` permissions):
	.s mute (@user) [time]

unmute    - Unmutes a muted user (requires `Kick Members` permissons):
	.s unmute (@user)

kick  - Kicks user from the server (requires `Kick Members` permissons):
	.s kick (@user) [reason]

ban   - Bans user from the server (requires `Ban Members` permissons):
	.s ban (@user) [reason]

unban    - Unbans a banned user from the server (requires `Ban Members` permissions):
	.s unban (username#tags)

changeLog.1/9/21:
Added `.s animal`, `.s covid`
Added `.s lock`, `.s unlock`, `.s slowmode` for admins
changeLog.1/3/21:
Added `.s memcount`
Added a few insults to `.s insult`.
changeLog.12/27/20:
Added `.s meme`, `.s weather`
Added more info to help guide
Fixed invalid user ping when user leaves server
Fixed `.s temp` to round to the nearest hundreth
changeLog.12/26/20:
**Added Utility Commands cog**
*Current commands: temperature converter (`.s temp`)*
Modified Rock-Paper-Scissors to send embeds instead of messages.
Removed the word 'asshole' from member leaving message.
Fixed the Goodbye GIF sending to the wrong channel glitch
changeLog.12/16/20:
Added Rock-Paper-Scissors game (.s rps), .s eatburger, .s kill, .s 8ball, .s cointoss
Added .s warn for admins
Goodbye message will now try to send to a text channel with goodbye in the name (if exists). Added gifs to hello/bye messages
changeLog.12/14/20:
**Added admin cog, with several new commands**
Shifted change log into a json file for ease of edit
Not entering an argument for .s help defaults it to short
Updated `purge` command to not include command message, also sends message when completed
Added 2 aliases for 'insult' command
changeLog.12/13/20:
Added `changelog` command
Added role requirement for `reload` and `purge` commands
